body:
Hello, today I would like to present to you the new Avicus Clash Royale clan. The name of the clan is "Avicus". There was one a long time ago, but it died out and is no longer relevant. You need a trophy count of at least 600 to join the clan, and you must be an active card donator. The current members of the team are:

Leader: NuclearDucky 

Co-Leader- PresidentBadger (known as The Badger)

Members: 
Prodigy4532
roadmanryan
_Nathy
Borrah
KojaCola
LFT
MrZelk

replies.body:
I have convinced 4 people in my clan and they do meet the requirements:

  • Active card donator
  • Has at least 1000+ trophies
  • Respectable, kind, and well-mannered people
  • And of course, excellent players ;)
But I would like to notify you that:

  • 2 people do not speak English (only Thai, and a little Finnish but I can translate for them.)
  • 1 person speaks fairly good English, so he will be able to understand simple instructions.
  • And that they are very competent and active players ;)
I will give you their IGN's by tomorrow via Skype.
